unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swore by Ayurveda! Remember that joint pain she had last Diwali? After visiting the Vaidyar near Thrissur and following his prescribed treatments – mainly herbal concoctions and some oil massages – she was dancing at Onam! It's amazing how ancient wisdom works. I even tried a simple ginger-turmeric paste for a cold once, felt better in 2 days. Ayurvedic treatment can work wonders.
